Mix on ice by periodically stirring. Can rock on rocking platform at 4*C for maximum 30min. Aliquot in 50-100ul aliquots (~40) and freeze at -20*C. Do not freeze status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"115mb","text":"Dissect out trachea and lungs and place in HBSS on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bo9mj","text":"Count two samples each per lung and note down the exact number of cells. This information is important for scRNA library prep. We routinely recover 8-10 million cells / mouse with this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bcp5","text":"Pipet 1ml digestion solution on the lid of a 10cm dish. Place the lung in it. Using a razor blade, \"mince\" the lung, holding one tip with the forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2e8l3","text":"Pipet the sample into 4ml of the digestion solution / lung (8ml per mouse) and incubate at 37*C for 30min with rocking (in a 15ml falcon tube).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"121bn","text":"Use a Pasteur pipet to triturate suspension until tissue is fully dissociated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1350i","text":"Pass the suspension through a 100 μm cell strainer into 50-mL tubes and use 10 mL of DPBS to pass through the strainer to wash it.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1sa84","text":"Centrifuge at 1000 × g for 5 min at 4°C, discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5onhj","text":"Add 1-2 mL of 1× RBC lysis buffer to resuspend the pellet and incubate for 5 min at 20°C–26°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6hods","text":"Add 10 mL of DPBS to stop the lysing,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"46oao","text":"Centrifuge at 1000 × g for 5 min at 4°C, discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cgv0","text":"Resuspend with 200 uL of 0.5% BSA in PBS. Keep on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqk1u","text":"Split lung samples into 100,000 cell aliquots, according to the cell counts determined above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d2a01","text":"Keep one aliquot on ice for the scRNA-seq sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fhlr","text":"For the remaining aliquots, spin down at 1000 × g for 5 min, discard the supernatant and resuspend in 90% FBS, 10% DMSO and freeze at -80*C. These are the scMS samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
